Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Ashland
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Ashland due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Ashland due to a door problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #62 Archer bus.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
